titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to the Honourable Mountstuart Elphinstone, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter, William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, encloses copies of his letters (not included with this letter) to William Grant Keir. He goes on to relay his communications with Rahma Bin Jauber [Rahma bin Jabir], who has assured Bruce that he will abide by the wishes of the British Government and will not commit any further acts of piracy against Bahrain or any other parts of the Gulf. Bruce goes on to discuss the Prince of Sheerauz [Shiraz] and his plan of launching an attack on Bahrain, which Bruce believes will never take place.
